name: Secret Sauce BBQ Ribs
desc: Wriothesley's specialty. Soon after kicking out his subordinates with the excuse, "Feel free to leave, but I'm staying! Things are heating up in here, and it could blow!", a meatastic delicacy greets your eyes. A full-bodied sauce slathered over flaky skin brings an extraordinary double blast of deliciousness, though as you taste it, it does seem to be practically identically to a condiment that has become awfully popular recently...

value.text: Restores 30% of Max HP and an additional 1,750 HP to the selected character.

customize.name: Recipe: Barbeque Ribs
customize.desc: A detailed step-by-step recipe for making Barbeque Ribs.

customize.name: Raw Meat
customize.desc: A fresh chunk of meat. Handled properly, it can be used to make delicious food.

customize.name: Pepper
customize.desc: Peppery. Cuts through oily flavors and excites the taste buds. Goes best on meat.

customize.name: Marcotte
customize.desc: A pink flower with a pearl-like luster and rich scent profile. It is one of the most important ingredients in a perfumer's arsenal.

customize.name: Barbeque Ribs
customize.desc: A crispy meat dish. Lightly fry the surface of the ribs until they exude a faint aroma, then wrap the crispy exterior with sauce, and finally, grill them slowly on low heat. The meticulous temperature control ensures that the exterior is perfectly crisp, while the meat within is kept juicy and tender.

customize.name: Wriothesley
customize.desc: Duke of the Fortress of Meropide, Lord Incognito of the murky depths.
